channel.title: Compiler Ideas?
channel.description:
Ok, so currently I accidently deleted my *(EDIT)batch idea files for compilers(EDIT)* outta the recycle bin. (Other words I can never get back) So I download another source and I now have this crappy *(EDIT)batch file compiler{EDIT)* to it.
[code]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
Can anyone pimp my *(EDIT)batch file compiler(EDIT)*? :D

item.title: Compiler Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

@echo off javac *.java pause

Use this compiler, or Taharok’s ‘Ultimate Compiler’.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @propaganda propaganda
item.description:
@propaganda wrote:

try this

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

my compiler used to suck, but i added this and now it works

Read full topic

item.description:
@aaronvdw wrote:

[quote=“The cook from runescape, post:8, topic:282325”]THIS IS THE JAVA COMPILER: JAVAC

THERE IS NO OTHER COMPILER
THERE IS NO OTHER COMPILER
THERE IS NO OTHER COMPILER
THERE IS NO OTHER COMPILER
THERE IS NO OTHER COMPILER
THERE IS NO OTHER COMPILER
THERE IS NO OTHER COMPILER

Even the guy above me realises that.[/quote]

item.title: Compiler Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @aaronvdw aaronvdw
item.description:
@aaronvdw wrote:

your pretty dumb… it doesnt matter how your compiler is , it has to be sure it compiles. Thats all , all compilers are the same. Click , Click , Enter , And your ready to go…

item.title: Compiler Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @Mightylizard Mightylizard
item.description:
@Mightylizard wrote:

It works and all but i just dont like it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 05, 2009, 12:20:21 pm[/size][hr]This is what i was talkin about…

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

item.title: Compiler Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

eczema3:

When will you retards get the jist of this, [size=2]A BATCH FILE IS NOT A COMPILER[/size].

QFT, So true…

That BATCH file is ok, it calls javac without you changing any variables which is useful but making more lines in a batch code is stupid.

Read full topic
